name: Sloshed Sirens
description:
A group of Sirens have been introduced to the wonders of alcohol. Driven by a lust for more, they begin stealing rum shipments from sailors and pirate alike with an army of zombies. Your job as a pirate is to save the rum from the sirens by travelling through the bay and collecting it before they destroy the rum supply in siren bay.

This prototype of Sloshed Sirens was developed in Game Maker over the course of one week and is the fourth game created  by Cryptic Ink.

[DISCLAIMER: Sprites are placeholder and the map is not accurate to concept]
